name: Craig Claiborne's Consomme
keywords: appetizer, beef bones, carrot, celery, leek, peppercorns, spices
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: Put bones in kettle and add cold water to cover. Bring to boil and simmer 1 minute. Drain well. Rinse bones under cold water and when thoroughly chilled, return to clean kettle.
Add six quarts of water, peppercorns, carrots, leeks and celery.
Tie cloves, parsley, thyme sprigs and bay leaves into bundle and add. Bring to boil and simmer uncovered for 5 hours.
Strain, discard solids and skim off fat.
